title: Ultimate Library Music
description: Over 260 audio files with over 11 hours of music, loops, ambients, variations and FXs. Everything from SCFI, Chill, horror, piano solo, happy, sad, fantasy, ambient and forest music.
longDescription:
This package is designed to give you everything you need musically! With over 11 hours of music, loops, variations and ambience and 260 audio files to choose from.


Categorised into 10 different genres: Scfi, Chill, Horror, Piano solo, Forest, Happy, Sad, Fantasy, Action, Ambience


WATCH THE TRAILER


Demos of EVERY Audio File available here CLICK ME


Please don't hesitate to Contact me if you have any problems: spdavies519@gmail.com
technicalDetails:
Packages Included:

Alien SCFI: 22 Files

Chill Vibes: 42 Files

Dark Horror: 26 Files

Five Pianos: 18 Files

Forest Music: 13 Files

Happy Days: 27 Files

Haptic Ambience: 21 Files

Pure Fantasy: 27 Files

Sad Times: 25 Files

Taking Action: 28 Files


No. of Audio Wavs: 260

No. of Audio Cues: 260

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 697min 42s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: All Above
